Content: Today is the 4th day of the educational, vocational and career guidance exhibition organized under the theme 19+ and a victory path. The exhibition is held at the Kuliyapitiya Central College. The exhibition has been organized to guide the youth to build up their future after GCE Advanced Level Examination. There are many stalls where the youth can get guidance on education, vocation and career advice. A large number of students visited the exhibition today. Deputy Minister Ashok Abeysinghe opened the exhibition today and visited the stalls.  He emphasized about the development of the country at ITN Studio setup at the exhibition premises.
